sqoop.arg: SELECT LkInvIsolatedReasonMSTID,InvIsolatedReasonID,MachineStageTypeID, 3 as "org_id", 'SPDV' as "org_name" FROM dbo._SP_LkInvIsolatedReasonMST WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT AcquisitionID,Acquisition,AcquisitionCode,Description, 1 as "org_id", 'SPMX' as "org_name" FROM dbo.Acquisition WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT AcquisitionDeviceID,AcquisitionVariableTypeID,WorkstationConfigID,Instructions,ImageURI,RfSourceID,DataDeviceID,DeviceArgs,DeviceOutput,FillMode,Preset,Multiplier,PreprocessingFunction,IsManualTrigger,IsManualConfirm, 1 as "org_id", 'SPMX' as "org_name" FROM dbo.AcquisitionDevice WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT AcquisitionVariantID,FromDT,ToDT,DataEntryURI,SPCURI,AcquisitionImageURI,LoginID,ModifiedDT,Comments,Instructions,PartID,Variant1,Variant2,Variant3,Variant4,Variant5,Variant6,Variant7,Variant8,Variant9,Variant10,Variant11,Variant12,Variant13,Variant14,Variant15,ToolTypeID,NoCavities,Documents,IsSuspendable,IsRotatableStepPlan,EBAReference,Variant16,Variant17,Variant18,Variant19,Variant20, 1 as "org_id", 'SPMX' as "org_name" FROM dbo.AcquisitionVariant_ WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT ActionStatusID,ActionStatus,ConditionalFormat,IsClosedState, 1 as "org_id", 'SPMX' as "org_name" FROM dbo.ActionStatus WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT AssetID,AssetName,RfAssetTypeID,LineID,MachineStageID,ToolID,GaugeID,PartID,InventoryPackID,LocationID,IsRetired,CostCentreID,ManufacturerID,SupplierID,AcquiredDT,PONumber,OrderedDT,ExpectedDeliveryDT,ExpectedFirstUseDT,EndUseDT,EndUseReason,PurchaseCost,DefaultLocationID,Comments, 1 as "org_id", 'SPMX' as "org_name" FROM dbo.Asset WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT AssetLevelID,AssetID,SubAssetID,Sequence,Comments,FromDT, 1 as "org_id", 'SPMX' as "org_name" FROM dbo.AssetLevel WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT AcquisitionVariantID,TargetSampleSize,RfAttrStudyTypeID,Instructions,ImageURI,NoHeads,RfSourceID,DataDeviceID,DeviceArgs,DeviceOutput, 1 as "org_id", 'SPMX' as "org_name" FROM dbo.AVAttribute WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT BOMVariantID,BOMVariant,PartID,IsDefault,BOMVariantIndex,IsRetired,LoginID,DT, 1 as "org_id", 'SPMX' as "org_name" FROM dbo.BOMVariant WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT CommonFaultID,CommonFault,Description,LineTypeID,MachineStageTypeID,ToolTypeID,GaugeTypeID,PartTypeID,RfAssetTypeID, 1 as "org_id", 'SPMX' as "org_name" FROM dbo.CommonFault WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT CostCentreID,CostCentre,Description, 1 as "org_id", 'SPMX' as "org_name" FROM dbo.CostCentre WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT DefectCountID,MeasurementSetID,HeadNo,DefectCount,Ignored,AttributeTypeID,ProductID, 1 as "org_id", 'SPMX' as "org_name" FROM dbo.DefectCount WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT DocumentTypeID,DocumentType, 1 as "org_id", 'SPMX' as "org_name" FROM dbo.DocumentType WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT FaultStateID,FaultID,FromDT,ToDT,FaultStatusID,Comments,LoginID,OpenedDT,SavedDT,IsEdited,RevisionNo,OriginalLoginID,EditedFaultStateID, 1 as "org_id", 'SPMX' as "org_name" FROM dbo.FaultState WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT IndividualDefectID,PartInstanceID,Ignored,DefectCount,MeasurementSetID,AttributeTypeID,ProductID, 1 as "org_id", 'SPMX' as "org_name" FROM dbo.IndividualDefect WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT InventoryUsageID,StartUsingComments,StopUsingComments,StartLoginID,StopLoginID,OpenedStartDT,OpenedEndDT,SavedStartDT,SavedEndDT,OriginalLoginID,EditedInventoryUsageID,Reference1,Reference2,Reference3,Reference4,Reference5, 5 as "org_id", 'SPTM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.InventoryUsage_ WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT LineGroupID,LineGroup,LineGroupCode,Description,OEETarget,WasteTarget,Reference1,Reference2,Reference3,Reference4,Reference5, 5 as "org_id", 'SPTM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.LineGroup WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT LineTypeID,LineType,Description,IsRetired,LineInfoPrecedence,BudgetChangeOver,BudgetEfficiency, 1 as "org_id", 'SPMX' as "org_name" FROM dbo.LineType WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT SPCChartDefID,SPCChartSetViewID,Sequence,LkCDefInCViewID, 1 as "org_id", 'SPMX' as "org_name" FROM dbo.LkCDefInCView WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT LkConcernRootCauseID,RootCauseID,ConcernID, 1 as "org_id", 'SPMX' as "org_name" FROM dbo.LkConcernRootCause WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT LkDocumentInvPackID,DocumentID,InventoryPackID, 1 as "org_id", 'SPMX' as "org_name" FROM dbo.LkDocumentInvPack WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT MaintenanceWorkID,FaultID, 1 as "org_id", 'SPMX' as "org_name" FROM dbo.LkFaultMaintWork WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT LkLocationMachineStageId,MachineStageId,LocationId,IsLocationIn,IsLocationOut, 1 as "org_id", 'SPMX' as "org_name" FROM dbo.LkLocationMachineStage WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT LkMPGMPID,MaintenanceProcedureGroupID,MaintenanceProcedureID, 1 as "org_id", 'SPMX' as "org_name" FROM dbo.LkMPGMP WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT LkPartAlternatePartID,AlternatePartID,PartID,PartToAlternatePartRatio, 1 as "org_id", 'SPMX' as "org_name" FROM dbo.LkPartAlternatePart WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT PartID,UnitID,LkPartUnitID, 1 as "org_id", 'SPMX' as "org_name" FROM dbo.LKPartUnit WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT RfSPCStatID,SPCStatsStyleID,LkSPCStatsStyleRfSPCStatID, 1 as "org_id", 'SPMX' as "org_name" FROM dbo.LKSPCStatsStyleRfSPCStat_CUS WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT ToolGroupID,ToolID,LkTTGID, 1 as "org_id", 'SPMX' as "org_name" FROM dbo.LkTTG WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT LkWIRBuildRecordID,WorkInstructionResultID,BuildRecordID, 1 as "org_id", 'SPMX' as "org_name" FROM dbo.LkWIRBuildRecord WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT MachineStageEventID,LoginID,DT,MachineStageID,MachineStageEventTypeID,Comments, 1 as "org_id", 'SPMX' as "org_name" FROM dbo.MachineStageEvent WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT MachineStopCategoryID,MachineStopCategory,Description,MachineStageTypeID,StopCategoryCode,DisplayOrder, 1 as "org_id", 'SPMX' as "org_name" FROM dbo.MachineStopCategory WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT MaintenanceManHoursID,MaintenanceWorkID,WorkerLoginID,ActualManHours,RevisionNo,IsEdited,ModifiedDT,SupplierID,SupplierCost,PersonnelGroupID, 1 as "org_id", 'SPMX' as "org_name" FROM dbo.MaintenanceManHours WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT MaintenanceProcedureGroupID,MaintenanceProcedureGroup,Description, 1 as "org_id", 'SPMX' as "org_name" FROM dbo.MaintenanceProcedureGroup WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT MaintenanceReasonID,MaintenanceReason, 1 as "org_id", 'SPMX' as "org_name" FROM dbo.MaintenanceReason WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT MaintProcScheduleOnAssetID,MaintenanceProcedureID,AssetID,RfPeriodTypeID,StartDate,AssetCountTypeID,EBAReference,IsEdited,LoginID,ModifiedDT,CalendarN1,CalendarN2,CalendarN3,CounterThreshold1,CounterThreshold2,CounterThreshold3,EstimatedCountPerDay,RunHourThreshold1,RunHourThreshold2,RunHourThreshold3,EstimatedRunHoursPerDay,EstimatedEventsPerDay,RevisionNo,IsRetired,PriorExecutions, 1 as "org_id", 'SPMX' as "org_name" FROM dbo.MaintProcScheduleOnAsset WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT MeasurementSetRequiredID,EBATriggerID,AcquisitionContextID,MeasurementSetID,RfAcquisitionStatusID,SubmittedDT,DueDT,DeadlineDT,ExpiryDT,OwnerID,ActionID,JobID,PartID,AssignedLoginID,InventoryPackID, 1 as "org_id", 'SPMX' as "org_name" FROM dbo.MeasurementSetRequired WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT OPCConstantID,OPCItemID,Description,Constant,Formula,ModifiedDT,LoginID, 1 as "org_id", 'SPMX' as "org_name" FROM dbo.OPCConstant WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT OPCItemID,OPCServerID,OPCGroupID,TagName,TagAddress,RfOPCItemTypeID,IsNotify,RawValue,UpdatedDT,Quality,Value,LastRawValue,LastUpdatedDT,LastQuality,LastValue,MachineStageID,ChangeAction,PLCID,IsDatedOnServer,IsStoredAsArray,IsActive,MachineStageEventTypeID,RfTransitionTypeID,TransitionToValue, 1 as "org_id", 'SPMX' as "org_name" FROM dbo.OPCItem WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT OPCParameterID,OPCItemID,Description,Scale,Offset,Formula,VariableTypeID,HeadNo,SampleNo,PositionNo,ModifiedDT,LoginID, 1 as "org_id", 'SPMX' as "org_name" FROM dbo.OPCParameter WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT OperationID,OperationTypeID,MachineStageID,JobID, 1 as "org_id", 'SPMX' as "org_name" FROM dbo.Operation WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT PartSubClassificationID,PartSubClassification,PartClassificationID, 1 as "org_id", 'SPMX' as "org_name" FROM dbo.PartSubClassification WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT ProductionStopID,ProductionStopReasonID,JobID,FromDT,ToDT,LineID,IsEdited,RevisionNo, 1 as "org_id", 'SPMX' as "org_name" FROM dbo.ProductionStop WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT RootCauseID,RootCause,Comments,RootCauseTypeID,LineTypeID,MachineStageTypeID, 1 as "org_id", 'SPMX' as "org_name" FROM dbo.RootCause WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT ScrapReasonID,ScrapReason,Description,MachineStageTypeID,DefaultUnitID,IsRetired, 1 as "org_id", 'SPMX' as "org_name" FROM dbo.ScrapReason WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT SettingsPlantTimeWindowsID,JobHistory,ProductionSpoilageHistory,DowntimeHistory,InventoryHistory,InventoryLabelHistory,BuildRecordHistory,LineInfoHistory,QualityMeasurementHistory,ProcessParameterHistory,OPCItemHistoryHistory,InitialLineInfoHistory,MaintenanceProjectionPeriod,ShiftLookAheadDays,ForwardSchedulingWindow,DefaultMaxTrendRecallWindow,DefaultConcernDuePeriod, 1 as "org_id", 'SPMX' as "org_name" FROM dbo.SettingsPlantTimeWindows WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT ShiftSequenceID,ShiftPatternID,ShiftTypeID,Sequence,ShiftStartTime,ShiftEndTime, 1 as "org_id", 'SPMX' as "org_name" FROM dbo.ShiftSequence WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT SPCChartControlLimitID,SPCChartComponentID,RfChartComponentID,RfChart,UCL,CL,LCL,FromDT,ToDT,RangeToDT,ModifiedDT,LoginID,RangeFromDT, 1 as "org_id", 'SPMX' as "org_name" FROM dbo.SPCChartControlLimit WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT SPCChartSetViewStyleID,SPCChartSetViewStyle,IsSpecLimits,IsControlLimitZones,IsGrid,IsTimescaled,IsHAxis,IsVAxis,IsXChart,IsRsChart,IsRsWChart,IsDistribution,IsShowComments,IsXScatter,IsIncludeIgnored,IsOnlyOSOCCharts,SPCStatsStyleID,IsVerticalOverview,OverviewWidth,OverviewHeight,PageBreakRfCutByIDs,ChartWidth,ChartHeight,IsFixedScale,IsParetoCurve,IsLegend,IsHorizontalDistribution,IsSigmaLines,IsShowCAComments,IsShowUnAckAlarms,HorizontalOffset,IsShowLimitLabels,IsColourZones,IsSystem,IsOSHotCold,FixedScaleOverscaling,IsConstantTitleRow,IsShowStatCategories,IsOverlayEnvelope,IsGradientBackground,RunChartFont,DistributionFont,StatisticsFont,VAxisFont,HAxisFont,OverlayKeyFont,IsShowOverlayKey, 1 as "org_id", 'SPMX' as "org_name" FROM dbo.SPCChartSetViewStyle_CUS WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT SPCStatsStyleID,SPCStatsStyle,IsSystem, 1 as "org_id", 'SPMX' as "org_name" FROM dbo.SPCStatsStyle_CUS WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT TagDefID,TagOwnerID,RfTable,TagTypeID,TagValue,DT, 1 as "org_id", 'SPMX' as "org_name" FROM dbo.TagDef WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT TagMSID,MeasurementSetID,TagTypeID,TagValue,DT,TagTreeNodeID,X,Y, 1 as "org_id", 'SPMX' as "org_name" FROM dbo.TagMS WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT TagTreeNodeID,TagTreeNode,TagTreeID,ParentTagTreeNodeID,Depth,SortOrder,ImageURI,NoCols,NoRows,SortExpression,ImageWidth,ImageHeight, 1 as "org_id", 'SPMX' as "org_name" FROM dbo.TagTreeNode WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT ShiftID,JobID,AcquisitionContextID,Checks_Done, 1 as "org_id", 'SPMX' as "org_name" FROM dbo.TMP_Checks_Done WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT ToolID,Supplier,Reference1,Reference2,Reference3,Reference4,Reference5,Ident, 1 as "org_id", 'SPMX' as "org_name" FROM dbo.Tool_ WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT ToolCavityStateReasonID,ToolTypeID,ToolCavityStateReason,Description,CavityStatusCode, 1 as "org_id", 'SPMX' as "org_name" FROM dbo.ToolCavityStateReason WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT ToolTypeID,ToolType,ToolTypeCode,Description,Variant1TagListID,Variant2TagListID,Variant3TagListID,Variant4TagListID,Variant5TagListID,Variant6TagListID,Variant7TagListID,Variant8TagListID,Variant9TagListID,Variant10TagListID,Variant11TagListID,Variant12TagListID,Variant13TagListID,Variant14TagListID,Variant15TagListID,Variant16TagListID,Variant17TagListID,Variant18TagListID,Variant19TagListID,Variant20TagListID, 1 as "org_id", 'SPMX' as "org_name" FROM dbo.ToolType WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT FromUnitID,ToUnitID,Multiplier,UnitConversionID, 1 as "org_id", 'SPMX' as "org_name" FROM dbo.UnitConversion WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT UnitCountTypeGroupID,UnitCountTypeGroup,Description, 1 as "org_id", 'SPMX' as "org_name" FROM dbo.UnitCountTypeGroup WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT VariableTypeClassID,VariableTypeClass,Description,Priority, 1 as "org_id", 'SPMX' as "org_name" FROM dbo.VariableTypeClass WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT WOID,WONumber,RunNo,PartID,QuantityOrdered,RfJobStatusID,DeadlineDT,ActualStartDT,ActualEndDT,PlannedStartDT,PlannedEndDT,EstimatedStartDT,EstimatedEndDT,CustomerID,IsDiscrete,Reference1,Reference2,Reference3,Reference4,Reference5,WORefID, 1 as "org_id", 'SPMX' as "org_name" FROM dbo.WO WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT WorkInstructionProcedureID,WorkInstructionProcedure,WorkInstructionRef,PartID,IsEdited,FromDT,ToDT,RevisionNo,LoginID,ModifiedDT, 1 as "org_id", 'SPMX' as "org_name" FROM dbo.WorkInstructionProcedure WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT Job.JobID, Job.WOID, Job.RfJobStatusID, Job.DeadlineDT, Job.ActualStartDT, Job.ActualEndDT, Job.PlannedStartDT, Job.PlannedEndDT, Job.PlannedDuration, Job.EstimatedStartDT, Job.EstimatedEndDT, Job.EstimatedDuration, Job.ScheduledSequence, Job.LineID, Job.ProductionStartDT, Job.ProductionEndDT, Job.TheoreticalCycleTime, Job.BudgetChangeOver, Job.QuantityOrdered, Job.IsCalculated, Job.LineGroupID, Job_.JobInstructions, Job_.ReleaseDT, Job_.ReleaseLoginID, Job_.StartLoginID, Job_.EndLoginID, Job_.Comments, Job_.ModifiedDt, Job_.ModifiedLoginID, Job_.StoppedReason, Job_.SkippedReason, Job_.SkippedDT, 3 as "org_id", 'SPDV' as "org_name" FROM Job FULL JOIN Job_ ON (Job.JobID = Job_.JobID) FULL JOIN Job_Custom ON (Job.JobID = Job_Custom.JobID) WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT MachineStop.MachineStopID, MachineStop.MachineStopReasonID, MachineStop.FromDT, MachineStop.ToDT, MachineStop.MachineStageID, MachineStop.IsEdited, MachineStop.RevisionNo, MachineStop_.StopComments, MachineStop_.StartComments, MachineStop_.StartLoginID, MachineStop_.StopLoginID, MachineStop_.OpenedStopDT, MachineStop_.SavedStopDT, MachineStop_.OpenedStartDT, MachineStop_.SavedStartDT, MachineStop_.OriginalLoginID, MachineStop_.EditedMachineStopID, 3 as "org_id", 'SPDV' as "org_name" FROM MachineStop FULL JOIN MachineStop_ ON (MachineStop.MachineStopID = MachineStop_.MachineStopID) WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
